post:
Thanks to all who signed up during our last promotion!

About Fiber Volt

Fiber Volt, a leader in the Virtualization hosting field stands apart from the crowd. We are based in San Diego, California and in Dublin, Ireland. We are well known for providing clients with high velocity, non-oversold, virtual private servers. All our servers and networks have a 99.9% uptime guarantee and a dedicated non-outsourced 24/7 support team.

Test IP: 65.50.224.120
Current Offers:

- 20% off recurring promo, just use coupon code: "HD-20PERCENT"

*This offer expires at the end of the month on June 30th!
